patthana16.32:4.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.32:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.32:5.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.32:5.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
